api_list.name: getPetById
getOrderById
api_list.description: For valid response try integer IDs with value >= 1 and <= 10.  Other values will generated exceptions

required_parameters.name: orderId
required_parameters.description: ID of pet that needs to be fetched

api_list.name: getUserByName

required_parameters.name: username
required_parameters.description: The name that needs to be fetched. Use user1 for testing.

api_list.name: logoutUser
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://petstore-blitz.p.rapidapi.com/user/logout"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "petstore-blitz.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: createUser
api_list.description: This can only be done by the logged in user.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://petstore-blitz.p.rapidapi.com/user"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "petstore-blitz.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
